entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Qualicum Beach

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening. A few flurries beginning late this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High zero.
